adjectives.description: accursed (comparative more accursed, superlative most accursed)

examples: Accursed race of Tiriel. behold your father // Come forth & look on her that bore you. come you accursed sons.

entries.meaning: (archaic, theology) Doomed to destruction or misery; cursed; anathematized.
examples: […] —if any one, be he who he may, attempt to alter the faith once for all delivered, let him be accursed.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of accurse
